QuestionJSON.Question: Taylor is a high school weightlifter who has been documenting their lifting progress every month over the past year. Taylor plans to showcase this data to their colleagues in the form of a graph that proves the relationship between consistent weightlifting and increased strength. What type of graph should Taylor use to best display this correlation?
QuestionJSON.Explanation: A line graph is the best option for displaying changes over time. In this case, Taylor would be able to clearly show the increase in their weightlifting ability over the past year.
